Name: Maida Vale
Ingredients: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
7.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Originally named the Unripe Manhattan after its creator's website, this Manhattan-style cocktail combines the spice of rye whiskey with sweet bianco vermouth and a dash of orange curaçao.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in January 2011 by Andy Green of Unripe, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Maida Vale contains 246 calories
